entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Bowen Island this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
